summary: Nearly 1 in 3 Americans relies on Medicare or Medicaid for services from hospital stays and lab tests to flu shots and prescription drugs. The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services uses an extensive network of private contractors to administer its programs. In FY 2016, CMS spent about $7.2 billion on these contracts, an increase of about 40% since 2012. We found that 97% of...
title: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services: Analysis of Contracting Data
